name: Devilish Diner
description:
This Local-Multiplayer action packed game is based in the underworld. Working as a group, you must deliver as many plates as possible in the given time limit, serving as many customers as you can. Avoid patron hazards or tidy them up with the corresponding tool. Get out there and earn your wage!

A group project developed by a team of 9. My personal role was the Lead Technical Designer.
